original_title: On Light, or the Ingression of Forms
overview: On Light, or the Ingression of Forms is a homage to philosopher of light, Robert Grosseteste.  The title is intended to be somewhat tongue-in-cheek since this video was made entirely in the dark, using only a circuit bent webcam.  No additional computer effects/sounds were added to the video.
title: On Light, or the Ingression of Forms
